member.name: T:FastMember.TypeAccessor
member.summary: Provides by-name member-access to objects of a given type

member.name: M:FastMember.TypeAccessor.CreateNew
member.summary: Create a new instance of this type

member.name: M:FastMember.TypeAccessor.Create(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a type-specific accessor, allowing by-name access for all objects of that type
member.remarks: The accessor is cached internally; a pre-existing accessor may be returned

member.name: P:FastMember.TypeAccessor.CreateNewSupported
member.summary: Does this type support new instances via a parameterless constructor?

member.name: P:FastMember.TypeAccessor.Item(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Get or set the value of a named member on the target instance

member.name: T:FastMember.ObjectAccessor
member.summary: Represents an individual object, allowing access to members by-name

member.name: M:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Use the target types definition of equality

member.name: M:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.GetHashCode
member.summary: Obtain the hash of the target object

member.name: M:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.ToString
member.summary: Use the target's definition of a string representation

member.name: M:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.Create(System.Object)
member.summary: Wraps an individual object, allowing by-name access to that instance

member.name: P:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Get or Set the value of a named member for the underlying object

member.name: P:FastMember.ObjectAccessor.Target
member.summary: The object represented by this instance
